airplane.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a vehicle that flies through the air and has one or more engines
airplane.translation[0].note_box[0].head: GRAMMAR: Patterns with airplane
airplane.translation[0].note_box[0].item: You usually say get on an airplane
As soon as he heard the news he got on an airplane
You say get off an aeroplane
We got off the airplane in Mexico City
